name: Blue Fleet
description:
BLUE FLEET THOUGT THEY COULD OUTRUN ME

THEY WERE WRONG

Destroy the spaceships of blue fleet by using your body, physics and their own bulets against them, in this relaxing space shooter where enemies shoot and you don't.

Made for 2 Colors Jam under 48 Hours.  The post jam version includes a minor bug fix and soothing audio.
